trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts" /> namespace contains objects that define the contexts all objects reside within.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts" /> 命名空間包含定義所有物件皆存在於其中之內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: A context is an ordered sequence of properties that defines an environment for the objects within it.
trans-unit.target: 內容為屬性的已排序序列，定義其內物件的環境。

trans-unit.source: Contexts are created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services such synchronization, transactions, just-in-time (JIT) activation, security, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 內容在物件的啟動程序期間建立，這物件被設定來要求特定自動服務，例如，同步處理、交易、Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程 (Activation)、安全性，等等。

trans-unit.source: Multiple objects can live inside a context.
trans-unit.target: 同一個內容可包含多個物件。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a new object is created, the.NET Framework finds a compatible context or creates a new context for the object.
trans-unit.target: 每當建立新的物件時，.net Framework 尋找相容的內容或建立新的內容物件。

trans-unit.source: After an object is placed in a context, it stays in it for life.
trans-unit.target: 物件放入內容之後，它會保持在其存留期間。

trans-unit.source: Classes that can be bound to a context are called context-bound classes.
trans-unit.target: 可以繫結至內容的類別稱為內容繫結類別。

trans-unit.source: When accessed from another context, these context-bound classes are referenced directly using a proxy.
trans-unit.target: 從另一個內容存取時, 使用 proxy 直接參考這些內容繫結類別。

trans-unit.source: A call from an object in one context to an object in another context will go through a context proxy and be affected by the policy implemented by the combined context properties.
trans-unit.target: 另一個內容中的物件從一個內容中的物件的呼叫會通過內容 proxy，然後會受到合併的內容屬性實作的原則。
